title: Collaboration-Based University Writing Education Design: Strengthening Practical Writing Competencies Through Project-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic writing skills and experience in preparing workplace reports
context.additional_context: Online real-time education in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, emphasizing job-linked writing competencies for current secondary educators

learning_goals: Learners improve workplace report-writing skills by completing collaborative writing projects via PBL (Problem-Based Learning).
Learners experience collaborative learning effects by revising drafts at least three times using peer feedback.
Learners acquire real-time collaborative writing skills using digital tools (e.g., Google Docs).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
